ygData.subject: Re: Exploits
ygData.msgSnippet: We are in complete agreement here, but it has only been 3 months since the game was released.  You know as well as I do that it will be quite some time before
ygData.messageBody:
We are in complete agreement here, but it has only been 3 months since the game was
released. You know as well as I do that it will be quite some time before they iron out
some of the more nasty bugs. I personally don't think its too wrong for them to ask you to
stop doing something that they consider an exploit. Just my opinion, nothing more. Since
this is getting way off topic I'll stop responding to this thread now before it gets way
out of hand.

> Have you ever seen a TV released that only shows prime number channels, with a promise
> to come fix it some time? Ever seen a stove that only heats to 50 degrees with a promise
> to come fix it some time? Ever see a car that only turns left with a promise to come fix
> it some time? No. This happens only in computer software, especially high profile games.
>

Well no, but I did buy Windows 98 :)
